brand.$description: Color used to express brand. Subject to theming. Use with caution!

main.$description: Loudest brand color. Currently reserved for header and tabs on public detail page.

main-contrast.$description: Should pass AAA contrast check with the value of 'main'.

alt.$description: The second most prominent brand representation in the color scheme.

alt-contrast.$description: Should pass AAA contrast check with the value of 'alt'.

highlight.$description: Brand accent color to be used sparingly when raising awareness for important elements.

highlight-contrast.$description: Should pass AAA contrast check with the value of 'highlight'.
